feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.8.1
entry.content:
Features

  • Added default API keys (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/7732815322b8efe606162c2cf0f38ecf1a2fc226)

Fixes

  • Fixed psycopg package name(https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/6c0eaed0f1b44f57f9fb94b1bc011c9eaa1ff186)

Other

  • Smaller media grid items (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/59842924962984c116b4e7b73a6a58032de58c06)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.8.2
entry.content:
Features

  • Added demo instance at yamtrack.fuzzygrim.com (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a25403909fb5be433a90c307395af44caa920e2a)

Fixes

  • Fixed sorting order with null items when using PostgreSQL (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/7a4e32f779228e5737c6f775d9271f1d47de5fc4)
  • Fixed episode image stretching (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/6f70cef8f2d2e966b6691e7af88d6d8259b5297b)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.8.1...v0.8.2

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.8.3
entry.content:
Feature

  • Added environment variables for toggling nsfw searches

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.8.2...v0.8.3

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.9.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Added video games tracking by @FuzzyGrim in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/132
  • Added environment variables for choosing TMDB metadata language (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/e92dbc5c490466f31eace770f61f1f8a2f5f32ad)
  • Added repeats field (rewatches, rereads, replays...) to media tracking form (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/b80ebc27755c2135791a350695f444a3c30aabea)
  • Added better date keys in media details e.g: release date for movies, air date for tv shows... (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/1ed3ac45c5631d745b578c1c5d750baa98d18791)

Fixes

  • Fixed issue importing from MAL with plan to read mangas https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/133 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/f7d17e7d1cea630432dffc353d94f9995c321e93)
  • Fixed media tracking form formatting when opened from media list with table format on mobile (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/80df20ddfac11500e4ed3ccc0dc49e2c3c701a4f)
  • Fixed media tracking form padding on small screens (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/00ec69d4ddfb578a444b15dfeb2cad673585771f)

Other

  • Cache external API calls for longer periods of time (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/327bb677651a356345b96193d038a67d26084f41)
  • Better API requests exception handling (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/7dfbebb24a25fa8f06bb0fdfae240df4013c86d9) (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/02a73ed2da444869c4efd0e14596ee9028e280cc) (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/55beeef2969f9f0a9c4cf9f3c6c5ba4dee5ca814)

Maintenance

  • Bump ruff from 0.3.3 to 0.3.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/137
  • Bump pillow from 10.2.0 to 10.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/136
  • Bump django-model-utils from 4.4.0 to 4.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/135

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.8.3...v0.9.0

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.9.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Center progress text for games in home page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a5e52fd4203c3aa72e3e1579f8b367625419a728)
  • Fixed repeat text in filtering button (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/058b8ec90c684534787ec368585c55a8c24b2162)
  • Fixed bugs when handling Special Seasons from TMDB (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a1fa4fbc66db922889be92d10fe78f6f0d2b0fc8)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.9.0...v0.9.1
